Articles.Content:
My installed Kerbal game crashes silently to desktop when using thermometer, mystery goo or spacecraft maneuvers.  Vanilla game (no mods).

KSP version: Linux Mint 17.2 64 bit, Krebal Steam version 1.1.2.1260 64 bit.
System specs: Asus K555L laptop - Core i3-4030U - Nvidia geforce 820M - 4GB DDR3

Any suggestions?

Player.log file:

{erased log}

 

Edited May 31, 2016 by Darguel
Any suggestions? I have 30% free ram memory, so it's not a full memory issue.

Start with editing your OP, removing the text log, and adding a link to drop box, google docs, etc for the log. Your post is a wall of text. You could use spoilers or the code box for your log but linking to it is better.

On 5/26/2016 at 1:04 PM, Tarheel1999 said:

Start with editing your OP, removing the text log, and adding a link to drop box, google docs, etc for the log. Your post is a wall of text. You could use spoilers or the code box for your log but linking to it is better. 

Ok, sorry about that. The problem stills persists but luckily its not been so frequent. So I'll keep it under observation.
